Topic.Title: New Game - You Walk Into a Bar

Posts.EditableText:
Hi folks! I've created a sandboxy urban-fantasy-type game, and I'd love for you to check it out. 

YOU WALK INTO A BAR is a light-hearted text game where you've had a bad day. Will your choices make it better or worse?
Navigate a world of monsters, illegal trading, and—scariest of all—other people.

https://textadventures.co.uk/games/view/br-pou02kkqijg_62ukjig/you-walk-into-a-bar

Thanks!

Posts.EditableText: I'm sure I'll play this at some point.

Posts.EditableText: The launch of the slot machine will coincide with the new Nitro Circus show series - New You Got This Tour, which will be recorded in Europe this year. The videos are expected to be unveiled in November and December 2018 in various countries.
